attributes.action: England & Scotland to display the poppy at next months game at Wembley.
attributes.additional_details:
Taking all football rivalries out of the equation this is an outrage that a football governing body can tell a country who it can show it's respects for. Read the article below.

http://buff.ly/2f7Is2c
attributes.background: The game takes place on Armistice Day. The poppy is not a political statement but a symbol of remembrance and the FA and SFA should have the right to display it on the kits out of respect to all servicemen and in particular those who gave all!
